clauses.title: This service still tracks you even if you opted out from tracking
clauses.description: Users can’t fully opt out of tracking technologies used for non essential purposes such as advertising, marketing or analytics. The user may be asked for consent for installing some tracking technologies on the device, and even if all are rejected the service will still track its visitors and ignore the choice.This case doesn’t apply to functional cookies that are necessary to provide the services.
clauses.clause_text:
Huawei uses flash cookies that can't be blocked through the browser settings.

case.text: This service still tracks you even if you opted out from tracking

clauses.title: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to the user
clauses.description: The Agreements can be updated at any time, including in a way that negatively affects user rights, without notifying before or after the changes.
clauses.clause_text:
Updates to This Statement

Huawei reserves the right to update this Statement at any time.

Should this Statement be revised from time to time, Huawei will release the change notice via various channels, for example, posting the latest version on our official website: https://consumer.huawei.com.

case.text: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to you

clauses.title: The service can delete your account without prior notice and without a reason
clauses.description: At any time, your account can be terminated without explanation and without warning by the service.
clauses.clause_text: "for reasons including but not limited to" means Huawei may suspend your account for no reason.

case.text: Your account can be deleted or permanently suspended without prior notice and without a reason

clauses.title: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.
clauses.description: Tracking technologies (such as web beacons, tracking pixels...) are employed on users and/or the service assigns a unique ID to a browser or device to track its behaviour.
clauses.clause_text: Huawei and some third parties may also use web beacons or pixel tags on websites

case.text: You are tracked via web beacons, tracking pixels, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting

clauses.title: The service uses social media cookies/pixels
clauses.description: These types of cookies/pixels send information to social media sites when you interact with the service.
clauses.clause_text:
Social Media Cookies.
Social media cookies are linked to services provided by third parties, such as 'Like' buttons and 'Share' buttons.
The third party provides these services in return for recognizing that you have visited our websites.
</p

case.text: You are being tracked via social media cookies/pixels

clauses.title: This service gathers information about you through third parties
clauses.description: This Service may employ, either identifiable or non-identifiable, data collection from third party sources about you.
clauses.clause_text: Huawei will collect information about you from public and commercial sources.

case.text: Information is gathered about you through third parties

clauses.title: The court of law governing the terms is in a jurisdiction that is less friendly to user privacy protection.
clauses.description: The Terms are governed by the applicable laws of a jurisdiction known for weak data regulations and poor user privacy protection. Usually contributors will need to explain in the Analysis view of each point linked to this Case the reason why it shall be applied.
clauses.clause_text: HUAWEI operates and manages this website from its headquarters in Guangdong Province in the People's Republic of China.

case.text: The court of law governing the terms is in a jurisdiction that is less friendly to user privacy protection.

clauses.title: The service uses your personal data for advertising
clauses.description: Your interaction with the service and data you have shared with them may be gathered to create an advertising ID or profile to target ads on you, either on the website you were visiting or in third party websites.
clauses.clause_text:
Huawei uses cookies to collect information about your online activities and interests and provide you with advertisements that correlate most highly with you.
</p

case.text: Your personal data is used for advertising

clauses.title: Your data may be processed and stored anywhere in the world
clauses.description: Your data is stored all over the world, including in countries where data protection rules may differ from the ones of the service's jurisdiction or those of your country jurisdiction.
clauses.clause_text: Our products and services are delivered through resources and servers located in different places, to offer our products and services, we may need to transfer your personal data among several countries.

case.text: Your data may be processed and stored anywhere in the world

clauses.title: Tracking pixels are used in service-to-user communication
clauses.description: The service tracks the user count or some actions of the user; this is usually used for statistics. For example, emails sent by a service can contain a pixel tag, which is a small, clear image that can tell them whether or not you have opened an email and what your IP address is.
clauses.clause_text: Pixel tags allow Huawei to send emails in a way that is readable to you and find out whether an email is opened.

case.text: Tracking pixels are used in service-to-user communication

clauses.title: You can opt out of promotional communications
clauses.description: You can update your account preferences and/or easily unsubscribe of email/sms lists to stop receiving promotional communications.
clauses.clause_text: Send you information about products and services you might be interested in, invite you to Huawei promotional activities and market surveys, or send marketing information to you. If you do not want to receive such information, you can opt out at any time.

case.text: You can opt out of promotional communications

clauses.title: This service assumes no responsibility and liability for the contents of links to other websites
clauses.description: The service rejects any responsibility for the contents of other websites to which it links.
clauses.clause_text:
p> This website may contain links to independent third-party websites.
Such links are provided only for the convenience of visitors to this website.
HUAWEI does not give any express or implied guarantees regarding the Content, services, and information provided on linked websites, nor should these links be deemed as a recommendation or authorization by HUAWEI with regard to the linked websites

case.text: This service assumes no responsibility and liability for the contents of links to other websites

clauses.title: This service assumes no liability for any losses or damages resulting from any matter relating to the service
clauses.description: The service assumes no liability for any damages the user incurs, including tangible (e.g. profits) and intangible losses (e.g. data), resulting from the use or inability to use the service or any other matter relating to the service.
clauses.clause_text: p> Except where forbidden by law, under all circumstances, HUAWEI will accept no responsibility for all indirect, derivative, incidental, collateral, or punitive damages that may be incurred from usage of this website, including but not limited to profit loss, even if HUAWEI is already aware of the potential risks

case.text: This service assumes no liability for any losses or damages resulting from any matter relating to the service

clauses.title: There is a date of the last update of the agreements
clauses.description: The given text has a date that allows to know when it was last updated.
clauses.clause_text: Last updated: September 30, 2019

case.text: There is a date of the last update of the agreements

clauses.title: There is a date of the last update of the agreements
clauses.description: The given text has a date that allows to know when it was last updated.
clauses.clause_text:
Updated on Nov.
27, 2019

case.text: There is a date of the last update of the agreements

clauses.title: Blocking cookies may limit your ability to use the service
clauses.description: Most browsers allow users to set preferences related to cookies storage. You may choose to block all cookies (including first-party cookies), but it may impact your use of this service and you may not be able to access some or any of the features provided.
clauses.clause_text: Disabling cookies may affect your use of some or all functions of these services.

case.text: Blocking first party cookies may limit your ability to use the service

clauses.title: Critical changes to the terms are made without user involvement
clauses.description: They may significantly update the terms at any time and at their sole discretion, meaning for any reason and without necessarily taking into account the interests or suggestions of the users of the Service.
clauses.clause_text: HUAWEI reserves the right to alter these Terms of Use at any time without providing notice.

case.text: Critical changes to the terms are made without user involvement

clauses.title: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at the users' sole risk
clauses.description: This service does not provide any guarantees as to its usability or fitness for the users' purposes. Users agree to use it at their own risk, accepting any possible bugs, malfunctions or harm to their devices.
clauses.clause_text:
THIS WEBSITE AND ITS CONTENT ARE PROVIDED ON AN 'AS IS' BASIS.
YOU, AS THE USER, BEAR ALL RESPONSIBILITIES FOR USAGE OF THIS WEBSITE AND ANY WEBSITE LINKED TO IT.

case.text: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at your sole risk

clauses.title: Spidering or crawling is not allowed
clauses.clause_text: You shall not use any form of device, program, or algorithm, including spiders, robots, deep-links, and page-scrapes, or any identical or similar manual program, to access, obtain, copy, or monitor any part of this website or its Content.

case.text: Spidering, crawling, or accessing the site through any automated means is not allowed

clauses.title: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for the activities on your account
clauses.description: You are responsible for protecting the confidentiality of your password and for maintaining the security of your account. Any activity occurring under your account is your responsibility, whether authorized by you or not.
clauses.clause_text:
You accept full responsibility for protecting the confidentiality of your account information, including your password.
You accept full responsibility for any and all actions that occur on or against your account in the event that you fail to maintain the security and confidentiality of said information.

case.text: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for the activities on your account

clauses.title: Failure to enforce any provision of the Terms of Service does not constitute a waiver of such provision
clauses.description: Even if the service does not or not always enforce all of the rules or provisions contained in its terms, they still apply. Users can at a later time still be held accountable for violating provisions that have not been enforced consistently.
clauses.clause_text: If HUAWEI fails to uphold or demand the strict execution of these Terms of Use, this should not be deemed as a waiver on the part of HUAWEI of any rights pertaining to the execution of these Terms of Use, or the Terms of Use themselves.

case.text: Failure to enforce any provision of the Terms of Service does not constitute a waiver of such provision

clauses.title: The service does not guarantee accuracy or reliability of the information provided
clauses.description: This service makes no warranty regarding the accuracy or reliability of any information that is given on its website or the results that may be obtained from the use of the service.
clauses.clause_text: HUAWEI DOES NOT GUARANTEE THE CORRECTNESS, COMPLETENESS, OR RELIABILITY OF THE CONTENT OF THIS WEBSITE

case.text: The service does not guarantee accuracy or reliability of the information provided

clauses.title: The court of law governing the terms is in Longgang District in Shenzhen City in the People's Republic of China
clauses.description: The Terms are governed by the applicable laws of a jurisdiction (specified in the title of each point by replacing the "X").
clauses.clause_text: The place of signing of this Agreement will be regarded as Longgang District in Shenzhen City in the People's Republic of China.

case.text: The court of law governing the terms is in location X
